formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'ChangeMonitor' =-
[Synopsis] Change monitoring filename of a channel
[Description] ChangeMonitor(filename_base) Changes monitoring filename of a channel. Has no effect if the channel is not monitored The argument is the new filename base to use for monitoring this channel.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,6 +4,6 @@ Change monitoring filename of a channel
[Description] - ChangeMonitor(filename_base) - Changes monitoring filename of a channel. Has no effect if the channel is not monitored + ChangeMonitor(filename_base): + Changes monitoring filename of a channel. Has no effect if the channel is not monitored. The argument is the new filename base to use for monitoring this channel.
